remarks: Lukasiewicz's shortest axiom for equivalential calculus (but modified to require decidable propositions).  Storrs McCall, ed., _Polish Logic 1920-1939_ (Oxford, 1967), p. 96.  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 5-May-2018.)
statement: bilukdc $p |- ( ( ( DECID ph /\ DECID ps ) /\ DECID ch ) -> ( ( ph <-> ps ) <-> ( ( ch <-> ps ) <-> ( ph <-> ch ) ) ) ) $.
